creator: Moore, John Thomas, 1844-1917. (author)
Saskatchewan Land and Homestead Company (author)
description: Moore, John Thomas: 1844-1917. Toronto businessman interested in the West; lived in Red Deer, Alberta, for a decade after 1901; member of Alberta Legislative Assembly, 1905-1909; returned to Toronto. // Cover title: "The settlers' pocket guide to homesteads in the Canadian North-West." A pamphlet written by the managing director of the Saskatchewan Land and Homestead Company describing the Company's lands.
